name: launchOptions
summary: Dictionary describing the arguments passed to the application on startup. Use the getArguments method to retrieve the launch options.

properties.name: launchOptionsLocationKey
properties.summary: If set to true, this key indicates that the application was launched in response to an incoming location event.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: This key indicates that the application was launched by another application with the specified bundle ID.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: This key indicates that the application was launched in order to open the specified URL.
